scripts.postinstall: cd lm-app && git switch master && npm i && cd ../lm-statics && git switch master && npm i
scripts.env:start:dev: npx concurrently -n 'env:build:dev,env:serve:dev' 'npm run env:build:dev' 'npm run env:serve:dev'
scripts.env:start:watch:dev: npx concurrently -n 'env:build:watch:dev,env:serve:watch:dev' 'npm run env:build:watch:dev' 'npm run env:serve:watch:dev'
scripts.statics:start:dev: npx concurrently -n 'statics:build:dev,statics:serve:dev' 'npm run statics:build:dev' 'npm run statics:serve:dev'
scripts.statics:start:watch:dev: npx concurrently -n 'statics:build:watch:dev,statics:serve:watch:dev' 'npm run statics:build:watch:dev' 'npm run statics:serve:watch:dev'
scripts.dev: npx concurrently --raw 'npm run env:start:watch:dev' 'npm run statics:start:watch:dev'
